ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
PrecisSPECIAL-PURPOSE VESSELS REGULATIONS which set out the requirements for the safe operation of commercial river rafting in Canada and replace the requirements for river rafting currently found in the Boating Restriction Regulations.
